words with ee,ea,ie.meaning_en: a hoofed grazing or browsing animal, typically having branched bony antlers that are shed annually and are borne only by the male in most species
words with ee,ea,ie.example_en: The deer ran gracefully through the forest.
words with ee,ea,ie.example_vi: Con hươu chạy uyển chuyển qua khu rừng.

words with ee,ea,ie.meaning_en: the number equivalent to the sum of one and two; one more than two
words with ee,ea,ie.example_vi: Cô ấy có ba con mèo.

words with ee,ea,ie.meaning_en: a flattened structure of a plant, typically green and blade-like, that is attached to a stem
words with ee,ea,ie.example_en: The leaf fell from the tree in autumn.
words with ee,ea,ie.example_vi: Chiếc lá rơi khỏi cây vào mùa thu.

words with ee,ea,ie.meaning_en: any of the regular occasions in a day when a reasonably large amount of food is eaten
words with ee,ea,ie.example_en: We enjoyed a delicious meal together.
words with ee,ea,ie.example_vi: Chúng tôi đã thưởng thức một bữa ăn ngon cùng nhau.

words with ee,ea,ie.meaning_en: a marine mammal with flippers, typically living in cold regions
words with ee,ea,ie.example_en: The seal swam playfully in the ocean.
words with ee,ea,ie.example_vi: Con hải cẩu bơi lội vui vẻ trong đại dương.

words with ee,ea,ie.meaning_en: a portion of an object or material, produced by cutting or breaking
words with ee,ea,ie.example_en: She ate a piece of chocolate.
words with ee,ea,ie.example_vi: Cô ấy ăn một miếng sô-cô-la.
